quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: People who say it cannot be done are usually interrupting someone doing it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Action expresses priorities.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: The only thing necessary for evil to triumph is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: The best view comes after climbing the mountain.
author: Unknown

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
author: J.P. Morgan

quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The only limit to our future is our own belief that it cannot become our reality.
author: Joel A. Barker

quote: The best time for new beginnings is now.
author: Unknown

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown

quote: The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: The greatest gift you can give someone is your time, attention, and love.
author: Unknown

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Val√©ry

quote: The only limit to our achievements is our doubts about what we can do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The only thing that stands between a man and what he wants from life is often merely the will to try it and the faith to believe that it is possible.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The only way to learn is to do.
author: Epictetus

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Alan Watts

quote: The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The only way to take control of your life is to take control of your consistent actions.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The only way to truly conquer something is to become it.
author: Dr. Drew Pinsky

quote: The only way to understand the limitations of language is to experience the limitlessness of silence.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The only way to understand the world is to understand a single life.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting some kind of battle.
author: Plato

quote: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: You are the master of your destiny; you are the captain of your soul.
author: Virgil

quote: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: You can't hit a target you cannot see.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
